channel.title: Inserts & Insoles – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pure Gel Self Adhesive Metatarsal Protector Pads for Flip Flop Sandals are specially designed for open toe footwear and thong sandals in particular. Measuring 3.75" long & 2.5" wide at the ball of the foot and 2mm thick, the soft polymer gel cushion protects the ball of the foot region by absorbing shock and evenly distributing weight. A built in low profile toe spreader helps to part the toes gently and further reduce rubbing and irritation. A hypoallergenic self adhesive backing fastenes the pad securely in place.

  • Cushions and absorbs shock at the ball of the foot or metatarsal regiion to redistribute pressure and reduce friction for relief from soreness and a burning sensation in the feet
  • Built in toe spreader provides protection from irritation caused in between the toes by wrapping around and guarding the toe thongs on flip flop sandals
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastens the pad in place during use
  • Latex free medical grade gel polymer

The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips prevent and comfort blisters and callusing caused by friction, and improve the comfort of poorly fitting footwear. A hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps it securely in place.

  • 1 Size Fits All - Measures 4" x 1" (at center) to 1.88" (wider at ends)
  • Offers targeted spot protection for relief from sensitive blisters, corns and hot spots on the heel of the foot
  • Cushions and absorbs shock to protect back of the heel from painful friction
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastens the pad in place
  • Latex free medical grade gel polymer

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
How to use:

  1. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before use. Do not use on open wounds!
  2. Remove the protective plastic sheet from the Heel Grip and place it in the shoe at the heel
  3. Press hard to secure the grip
  4. Adjust positioning to find best placement for you

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Heel Grips, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads are soft to the touch with a hypoallergenic self adhesive backing to ensure they are fastened securely in the proper position. Ideal for pain under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. Diabetics and those with poor blood circulation should always seek professional medical advice before trying.

  • Ideal for relieving the burning sensation under the entire heel area caused by standing or walking for long periods. The product provides excellent pressure relief and redistributes the impact on the heel
  • Low profile ergonomic design makes these a good option for use in any footwear, including open toe sandals, court shoes, boots, high heels or women's shoes with a narrow fit.
  • Reduce discomfort from sore, tired feet, heel pain, heel spurs, blisters, warts, etc.
  • One size fits all. Heel pads measure 3" x 2". Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing keeps pads in place.
  • Sold in pairs. Washable and reusable. Allow to dry naturally.

The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Self Adhesive Heel Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Heel Grips, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The innovative design of double curves and groove keeps heels stretchable and breathable while soft gel reduces the pressure of heels and strengthens heel part with elasticity and shock-absorption.

It can memorize the shape of foot and the gel’s inorganic antibacterial ingredients can prevent bacterial growth. The materials are environmental-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Heel Grips, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Heel Grips, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Slim Silicone Insoles | 3/4″ Thick Metatarsal Pad
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical Full Length Slim Silicone Insole with 3/4" Thick Metatarsal Pad is designed to provide pain relief to sore feet, especially metatarsals, arch, and heel areas. A softer density, colored silicone gel area offers additional relief to sensitive areas that need it the most. These help dissipate pressure, absorbing the energy on first impact and then quickly releasing it to assist propulsion.

The post Slim Silicone Insoles | 3/4″ Thick Metatarsal Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
May provide relief for foot, heel, ankle and knee discomfort by reducing irritation and inflammation. By providing even pressure distribution and shock absorption, the insole works to give maximum support to the entire foot. Especially recommended for athletes, gymnasts and sports, those who work on their feet all day, and senior men and women in general.

  • Recommended by medical professionals.
  • Designed to reduce shock and vibration while providing even pressure distribution to the entire foot.
  • Raised softer density silicone gel metatarsal pads give additional cushioning and extra shock absorption at the ball of foot.
  • Anatomic fit can be used with most kinds of footwear.
  • The super thin design is especially suitable for dress footwear.
  • Improved ankle and foot function will help to improve your endurance, letting you stay active on your feet for longer!
  • Durable, washable and reusable.
  • Latex free and hypoallergenic.

The post Slim Silicone Insoles | 3/4″ Thick Metatarsal Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Dual Durometer Silicone Heel Cups with Blue Dots
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical Dual Durometer Silicone Silicone Heel Cups absorb shock to help relieve and prevent heel pain. This heel cup is made from dual density medical grade silicone and is hypo-allergenic. It offers comfort, cushioning, and maximum shock absorption for relief from heel spurs, plantar fasciitis, foot, ankle, knee and back pain.

The post Dual Durometer Silicone Heel Cups with Blue Dots appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Help protect the calcaneus and all associated skeletal structures (knees, hips, and spinal column) from the destructive forces of shock. The large, soft and center posting provide additional cushioning and take pressure off painful areas.

  • Low profile design – use in dress shoes or athletic shoes
  • Molded silicone provides shock absorption upon heel strike and helps minimize vibration loads to joints
  • A soft blue center at the heel bone cushions the heel and helps reduce the strain on pain-sensitive areas
  • Wedge shaped footplate keeps the foot in dorsi-flexed position to help maintain correct posture while gently stretching the tendons
  • 100% medical-grade silicone. Soft, breathable, and hypoallergenic
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Comes as a pair fitting left and right
  • Latex Free

The post Dual Durometer Silicone Heel Cups with Blue Dots appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Hammer Toe Crest Gel Cushion
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Hammer Toe Crest Pad lifts and stretches the toes away from the ball of the foot, helping to straighten toes and alleviate pain derived from clenching the foot. Silica gel hammer toe crests add padded cushioning beneath cramped toe joints, creating space where the toes meet at the base of the metatarsal region. These help to realign and straighten the toes, while working to stretch the tight tendons that cause the toes to draw up, bringing the wearer relief.

The post Hammer Toe Crest Gel Cushion appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Gently stretches and cushions beneath the base of cramped toe joints (at the ball of the foot)
  • Relieves the tensing up of tendons in the foot that results in clenched toes
  • Fits comfortably inside shoes
  • Specify Right/Left and Size
  • Durable/Washable/Reusable
  • Sold individually

The post Hammer Toe Crest Gel Cushion appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Horseshoe Felt Corn Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Fresco Horseshoe Corn Pad is a U shaped self adhesive felt pad in Small and Large sizes that come in two thicknesses: 2mm and 3mm. The cut out space ensures maximum comfort for the wearer by minimizing contact with and pressure on the corn. Ideal for protection of painful areas on the feet due to friction, corns, blisters, bunions, warts, etc.

The post Horseshoe Felt Corn Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Cushions and absorbs shock to protect small, tender areas prone to corns from friction and irritation
  • Ideal for local spot protection of corns, sores and hot spots in hard to reach locations
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing helps to fasten the felt pad securely in place
  • Felt pad comes in two sizes (Small or Large) & in two thicknesses per size (2 mm or 3 mm)
  • Small sold in packs of 20, Large sold in packs of 10

The post Horseshoe Felt Corn Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pure Gel Self Adhesive Comfort Spur Heel Cups
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Fresco Pure Gel Self Adhesive Comfort Spur Heel Cups absorb shock to help relieve and prevent heel pain. This heel cup is made from medical grade silicone and is hypoallergenic. It offers comfort, cushioning, and maximum shock absorption for relief from heel spurs, plantar fasciitis, foot, ankle, knee and back pain.

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Comfort Spur Heel Cups appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Help protect the calcaneus and all associated skeletal structures (knees, hips, and spinal column) from the destructive forces of shock. The large, soft and center posting provide additional cushioning and take pressure off painful areas. Can be washed in hot or cold water, using any kind of soap or detergent and can be dried at temperatures of up to 500º C. There is no need for talcum powder

  • Breathable, hypoallergenic
  • Low profile design – use in dress shoes or athletic shoes
  • Comes as a pair fitting left and right
  • Pads and absorbs shock to protect sore heels or heel spurs from direct pressure
  • Wedge shaped footplate keeps the foot in dorsi-flexed position to help maintain correct posture while gently stretching the tendons
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastenes the heel cups in place
  • Made from 100% medical grade silicone
  • Latex Free

The post Pure Gel Self Adhesive Comfort Spur Heel Cups appeared first on AT Surgical.
